headline: Regeneron (REGN) Valuation Check After Japan Clears Dupixent for Pediatric Severe Asthma Expansion
summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN) just picked up an important regulatory win in Japan, where health authorities approved Dupixent for children aged 6 to 11 with severe bronchial asthma, widening the drug’s global pediatric reach. See our latest analysis for Regeneron Pharmaceuticals. The Dupixent news lands while Regeneron’s momentum is clearly building, with a 90 day share price return of about 33% and a 1 year total shareholder return of roughly 9%. This reflects improving growth...
